WRITING.TEXT: That's what bothers me. I feel like minamadali ko if I want to ask her now (well more like sometime next week) but all my friends tell me na we're long overdue na para mag antayan pa.
Give them a taste of their own medicine. Nitpick them. Masarap mang-inis ng mga ganyan.
Actually, IT haha. I came from the Makati campus. Never have been inside sa Intra cos I only lasted for like two terms before transferring to a new school and shifting to a new course.

We both like writing and watching cartoons. But most recently, we watch GMA's Destined To Be Yours and talk about the episode over on FB. We both know it's a mediocre show but it's our guilty pleasure to just watch it.
Her bestfriend has a boyfriend though and I'm not that kinda guy. Still a virgin as well hahaha

Will do haha. I've had MUs before pero never ko nanligaw kasi takot ako sa (not what you're thinking) rejection. Di sa mahangin pero aminado naman akong may itsura ako haha but I dunno. I just don't know what to do next with my life if she ever says no. But I'm telling you, she's different. My favorite part when talking to her is when we discuss how sad and gloomy the world is. I guess we share a melancholic perspective in life. Maybe that's why I like her.

NGSB here. I've had a crush on my classmate since last semester. Pa on/off yung crush ko sa kanya cos everytime may maliit na incovenience between us, bigla ako nag e-eject sa kanya but when something good happens like inaya nya ako kumaen or when she just smiles at me, all my feelings for her comes rushing back to me. Recently, ang consistent na ng bonding namen. Nakapunta na kame sa Rizal Park, hinahatid ko sya sa LRT. Soooo... I was just wondering kung is it the right time na ba para manligaw? Let me add lang din na super torpe kaming both kaya asar samen madalas ng tropa namen na nag aantayan lang kame.
TIL there is a subreddit solely dedicated to creampies. Thank you kind sir/mam.
bruh you ever heard of false positives??
Ang sarap ng giniling sa 7/11.
Seems that a lot of you really like The Bends while feel ko ako lang may favorite talaga Kid A with OK Computer being second.
I don't know with "No Surprises" but that song makes me want to just lay down and cry haha. Personally, "Karma Police" is a much more calm track.
Well kakainom ko lang kanina so... haha. I'm not here, this isn't happening
If you watch HBO's Westworld, they actually did a piano version of that song and three other Radiohead songs as well.
Fuck you grant!
Naka-hide yung mga post ko sa kanila. Puro dank and offensive memes mga post ko. They don't really get my humor so ayokong pag diskitahan pa nila ako dahil lang dyan.

Watched it last night. It's too cliche and formulaic in my very honest opinion. You've seen this kind of show before. But damn, si Maine ang nagbubuhat sa cast. She just brings this kind of charisma sa show.
Listening to Radiohead's "True Love Waits." The band is just my go to for depressing songs. Anyone else who listens to them?

Took IT immediately after graduating high school cos it was a bandwagon course at the time. What's worse? Sa Mapua pa ako nag enroll. Dropped after two terms. It was a devastating waste of money for my parents but I made a lot of good friends there.
Manonood ako ng Destined To Be Yours habang umiinom. Anong pwedeng drinking game??
The karaoke joke at the end was gold!!
Classes suspended cos of strike. No money. Gustong gumala or at least lumabas lang.
I've fallen in love naman na sa show. I'll watch it til the end.
I always see memes of Fry and lots of recommendations at r/television so I decided to watch it as well. Season 2 palang ako. Reminds me a lot of Rick and Morty.
Binge watching Futurama. Anyone else nanonood non??

I cannot recommend Strike Back enough. Every episode has an intense amount of action. As I've read before here, think of it as 24 on cocaine with nudes! Also, it's on Cinemax. The same channel that brought you Banshee.

When he was still in the closet (even though it was so obvious from the day I met him), he was just so normal and a friend that you could hang out with anytime. But after coming out, he became more "aggressive" with his sexuality. He'd check out guys and hang out with the gay clique more often. Maybe I just feel jealous considering that we've been good friends since last year then suddenly he leaves me and the tropa hanging.

Was the Christmas speacial any good? I've been thinking of abandoning this show ever since the recast of one of the sensates and the showrunner leaving. I fear that the show will never get to the end because of the off screen shakeups.

"K zoned" ako ng gay friend ko. I'm trying to be good friends with him pero ever since nag out na sya, he's been... for the lack of better term, malandi. I mean I'm proud of him for finally expressing his true self but damn sana maalala nya na kaibigan nya parin kame.

I've been there. A year and a half naman tinagal ng pagiging "out-of-school youth" ko. Not to be overdramatic but the thought of purposeless and pagiging sloth ko sa bahay gave me depression. You're lucky your parents are still there for you. All you have to do is to find something to make you happy. Try bonding more with your family.
Oohh. I actually enjoyed my comm. theories subject from last sem. Cultivation theory is what struck me the most as someone who watches a lot of TV.

Remind ko lang that the movies are VERY different from each other in terms of the way they're filmed, tone, and story but it still feels like they're in the same universe. It's a fun franchise actually! Can't wait for the next one.
